thread.title: Actor-author LeVar Burton speaks at Kohler speaker series

title: Actor-author LeVar Burton speaks at Kohler speaker series
text: Actor-author LeVar Burton speaks at Kohler speaker series Buy Photo Actor and Author LeVar Burton gives his presentation “The Power of Storytelling: Written, Spoken, Lived” during the Kohler Foundation's Distinguished Guest Series Friday October 16, 2015 in Kohler. Burton reads from a book he wrote. Phil Bock/Sheboygan Press Media Fullscreen Buy Photo Actor and Author LeVar Burton gives his presentation “The Power of Storytelling: Written, Spoken, Lived” during the Kohler Foundation's Distinguished Guest Series Friday October 16, 2015 in Kohler.
